response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this exceptional item at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in its value and relevance to your needs. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer within the next 48 hours. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1200000}
